body:
I just approved your post (and deleted the duplicate). Your future posts
should go through without need for approval.

On 5 January 2016 at 19:46, Liam Staskawicz <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> thank you.
>
> i sent an email with a new topic from liam@stask.net and didn't see it
> show up in the web ui after ~30-40 minutes, so tried posting from the web
> ui, and got feedback that my topic would be posted after it was approved
> (wasn't able to grab a screenshot of the specific language used).
>
> so, assuming the msg actually shows up at some point, it appears to be all
> good - hoping this first msg (which might now be a double post) is just
> subject to additional moderation.
>
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/13819#issuecomment-168935875>.
>
